info.readme:
Note: This version of nForum uses Examine v1.4 and the binaries for it are bundled within the package. So your existing Examine binaries will be replaced with these updated ones.
-- SQL CE Installation notes It has been reported that the package installer sometimes times out when trying to install, unfortunately there is no obvious reason for this as its using the standard Umbraco package install files.
But if this does happen, it seems if you just reinstall the package it will go through and get to the nForum installer.
-- IIS / IIS Express / Web Matrix The installer / package as only been tested on the above, if you are running Umbraco through Visual Studios cassini/web server. I cannot guarantee it will install without any problems - This has not been tested.
For more information about this package see http://our.umbraco.org/projects/website-utilities/nforum
or check on my blog for tutorials http://www.blogfodder.co.uk
You can also follow me on Twitter @YodasMyDad

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Topics Per Page
GenericProperty.Description: This is the number of Topics shown on each page.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Posts Per Page
GenericProperty.Description: This is the number of Posts shown on each page of a Topic

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Closed
GenericProperty.Description: This setting closes the forums so no one can post with this is ticked, good for maintenance or if you have a spam problem.

GenericProperty.Name: Karma Points Added Per Post
GenericProperty.Description: How many karma points are added to user when they post.

GenericProperty.Name: Karma Points Added For Thumbs Up
GenericProperty.Description: How many Karma points are added to user if another user thumbs up their post.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Name
GenericProperty.Description: The name of the forum, appears in the footer and general notifications

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Karma Allowed To Vote Amount
GenericProperty.Description: This is the amount of karma a user must have before they are allowed to use karma (Vote up or down other posts)

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable Karma
GenericProperty.Description: Choose whether to enable karma on the forum, if disabled it willl just hide the karma box and thumbs up / down

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Admin Email
GenericProperty.Description: The admin email is used for spam reporting and other general notifications

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Notification Reply Email
GenericProperty.Description: This is the email address which all email notifications will be sent from, most people use noreply@yourdomain.co.uk

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable Ajax Post Snippets
GenericProperty.Description: When enabled shows an Ajax preview of the post content on the topic listing pages when user hovers over the topic name.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable Member Reporting
GenericProperty.Description: Allow members to report other members to the admin, can help with stopping spammers

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable Private Messaging
GenericProperty.Description: Allow forum members to send private messages to each other, members can also choose whether to enable this in their profile.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Private Message Flood Control
GenericProperty.Description: Time in MINUTES each member must wait before being able to send a private message, this will help stop spammers

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable RSS Feeds
GenericProperty.Description: Enables RSS feeds for topics in each category

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable Mark As Solution
GenericProperty.Description: Tick this option if you want to enable people to be able to mark a post as a solution

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable Spam Reporting
GenericProperty.Description: Enables a little link on each post, which lets registered users report a post for spam

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Enable Topic Email Subscriptions
GenericProperty.Description: Allow members to receive email notifications on any topic they subscribe to.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Manually Authorise New Members
GenericProperty.Description: If you want to only let pre-vetted members use the forum, then check this and you will have to authorise them before they can login.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Email Admin On New Member Sign Up
GenericProperty.Description: This emails the forum admin telling them a new member has registered on the forum

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Category Is Private
GenericProperty.Description: Unless the user is logged in, they will not be able to see this category

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Category Is Main Category
GenericProperty.Description: Select this is you want this category to appear on the main list of categories on the forum home page.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Category Permission Karma Amount
GenericProperty.Description: This is the minimum amount of karma a user must have before being allowed view/enter this category (Must be used with the Is private setting above)

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Category Post Permission Karma Amount
GenericProperty.Description: This is the minimum amount of karma a user must have to be able to post in this category - They can still view everything just have no create access.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Post Owned By
GenericProperty.Description: Must have a member ID in here

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Post Last Edited
GenericProperty.Description: If the user has edited the post after they first posted it, store date here and show at bottom of post

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Post In Reply To
GenericProperty.Description: If this post is in reply to a specific post, we store that post node id here.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Post Users Voted
GenericProperty.Description: This is a comma seperated list of member IDs who have already voted this post up or down.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Post Is Topic Starter
GenericProperty.Description: This is just a flag for the front end

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Topic Owned By
GenericProperty.Description: Must have a member ID in here

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Topic Subscribed List
GenericProperty.Description: This is a list of member ID's who have subscribed to receiving email notifications for this topic

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Topic Closed
GenericProperty.Description: If you close a topic then then it means no one can post in it anymore.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Topic Solved
GenericProperty.Description: an indication as to whether the forum post is solved or not. If marked as solved no further email notifications will be sent.

GenericProperty.Name: Forum Topic Parent Category ID
GenericProperty.Description: IMPORTANT: If you manually move a topic to a different category, you must set the parent category id here (This is used to help get round the topics being in datefolders)

Template.Name: Forum Active Topics
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/ForumMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Active Topics

Template.Name: Forum Category
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/ForumMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
<asp:Content ID="Content1" ContentPlaceHolderId="forumhead" runat="server"> <script src="/scripts/nforumhoverintent.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <script src="/scripts/nforumajaxpostsnippet.js" type="text/javascript"></script> </asp:Content>
<asp:Content ID="Content2" ContentPlaceHolderId="ForumBody" runat="server">
<umbraco:Macro Alias="nForumShowSubCategories" runat="server"></umbraco:Macro> <umbraco:Macro Alias="nForumListTopics" runat="server"></umbraco:Macro>
</asp:Content>

<asp:content ID="Content2" ContentPlaceHolderId="ForumBody" runat="server"> <umbraco:DisableRequestValidation runat="server"/> <umbraco:Macro Alias="nForumCreateNewTopicForm" runat="server"></umbraco:Macro>
</asp:content>

Template.Name: Forum Master
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <%@ Register src="~/usercontrols/nForum/includes/MainMessage.ascx" tagname="MessageBox" tagprefix="msg" %> <umbraco:Macro Alias="PageTitle" runat="server"></umbraco:Macro>
<% //#### DEVEOPERS - READ ME & THEN DELETE ME #### //If you are going to move the forum into your own Master page, //You need to update the links below to point the the correct pages within the forum //############################################## %> Login / Register
<% //#### DEVEOPERS - READ ME & THEN DELETE ME #### //If you are going to move the forum into your own Master page, //You need to update the link below to point the the correct search page //############################################## %>
<% //#### DEVEOPERS - READ ME & THEN DELETE ME #### //If you are going to move the forum into your own Master page, //You need to make sure the [msg:MessageBox ID="MainMessageBox" runat="server"] below is placed on your main master //############################################## %>
nForum v1.5 powered by Umbraco, built by n3o
© <%=DateTime.Now.Year%>
